name: 3D Menu Awesome by Themes Awesome
author: Themes Awesome

sections.description:
3D Menu Awesome – Stunning 3D Off Canvas Menu WordPress Plugin

3D Menu Awesome is an awesome WordPress 3D Menu Plugin that helps You to create the a WordPress menu interface element into your WordPress Site with custom layouts and effects. 3D Menu Awesome is easy to use with extensive choice of 3d layout styles.

Check 3D Menu Awesome Demos

3D Menu Demo

3D Menu Awesome Feature

3D Menu Pro || Read Documentation || View Demo

  • Custom Menu Background
  • 2 Types of Menus
  • 2 Types of Menu Buttons
  • 2 Menu Button Styles
  • Custom Menu Label
  • Extensive Options
  • Fully Customized
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Fonts Colors
  • Tested on all Modern Browser
  • Responsive

Get More Features On Pro

3D Menu Pro

  • More 3D Menu Interface Styles
sections.faq:
Is there a time period for using 3D Menu?

No, you can use 3D Menu onwards.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! 3D Menu will Works With Any Theme

What if I update to 3D Menu to Pro?

Your existing content will work with 3D Menu PRO. So you wonâ€™t lose your contents.

How do I translate the plugin?

We recommended Loco Translate for translate.for details on how to use it you can read our online documentation.
